```{r data wrangling table}
DataWrangleTable <- tibble::tibble( Example = c("GoogleSheet", "OpenRefine", "RNotebook", "RScript", "DataIku"),
                                    Approach = c("Manual", "Interactive", "Interactive", "Scripted", "AI"),
                                
                                Reproducible = c("No", "Possible", "Yes", "Yes", "Possible"),
                                StartUp = c("Quick", "Quick", "Moderate", "Moderate", "Slow"),
                                Scale = c("Tiny", "Small", "Middle", "Big", "Bigger"),
                               )

knitr::kable(DataWrangleTable, caption = "Data Wrangling Approaches")
saveRDS(object = knitr::kable(DataWrangleTable), file = file.path("RGraphics", "DataWranglingTable.Rds"))
```

```{r metadata data flowchart}
#https://datascienceplus.com/how-to-build-a-simple-flowchart-with-r-diagrammer-package/

MetaDataDataFlowChart <- DiagrammeR::grViz("digraph flowchart {
      # node definitions with substituted label text
      node [fontname = Helvetica, fontsize = 18, shape = rectangle]        
      tab1 [label = '@@1']
      tab2 [label = '@@2']
      tab3 [label = '@@3']
      tab4 [label = '@@4']
      tab5 [label = '@@5']
      tab6 [label = '@@6']
      tab7 [label = '@@7']
      tab8 [label = '@@8']
      tab9 [label = '@@9']
      tab10 [label = '@@10']
      tab11 [label = '@@11']
      tab12 [label = '@@12']

      # edge definitions with the node IDs
      tab1 -> tab2;
      tab2 -> tab3;
      tab3 -> tab12;
      tab2 -> tab4;
      tab1 -> tab4;
      tab4 -> tab5;
      tab5 -> tab12;
      tab6 -> tab7;
      tab7 -> tab9;
      tab1 -> tab8;
      tab2 -> tab8;
      tab8 -> tab9;
      tab9 -> tab12;
      tab1 -> tab10;
      tab2 -> tab10;
      tab10 -> tab11;
      tab11 -> tab12
      }

      [1]: 'MetaData; each culture bears a unique ID, ex. DoCa1001'
      [2]: 'MultiCulti maintains and logs culture growth'
      [3]: 'Rmd1 imports and estimates growth rate'
      [4]: 'Spectrophotometer captures spectra'
      [5]: 'Rmd2 imports and estimates pigment content'
      [6]: 'Light meter measures fluorometer lights'
      [7]: 'Rmd3 imports and calibrates light levels'
      [8]: 'Fluorometer measures PSII function'
      [9]: 'Rmd4 imports and estimates Electron Transport'
      [10]: 'Optode measures [O2]'
      [11]: 'Rmd5 imports and tidies [O2]'
      [12]: 'Rmd6 compares Electron Transport, [O2], Pigment Content & Growth Rates'
    ") 

MetaDataDataFlowChart

saveRDS(object = MetaDataDataFlowChart, file = file.path("RGraphics", "MetaDataFlowChart.Rds"))
```
